SDG_GOAL: Goal 7: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
SDG_TARGET: Target 7.1: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services
SDG_INDICATOR: Target 7.1.1: Proportion of population with access to electricity
REC_USE_LIM:
Countries classified as “High Income” based on the World Bank Country and Lending Groups are assumed to reach universal 
access from the first year the country joined the category.
